Authentication¶

This is the API for authentication

auth.create_user(email: str, password: str, role: str)¶

Creates a new user in the Cognito Pool.

Endpoint

/api/users/create

Request Type

POST

Access

ALL
Parameters

  • email (str, required) – The email of the user.

  • password (str, required) – The raw password of the user.

  • role (str, required) – Specified role of the user.

Returns

  • UserCreationSuccess (Response)

  • code – 200

  • message – The user has been successfully created.

  • EmailInUse (Response)

  • code – 400

  • message – This email is already being used.

auth.delete_user(email: str, auth_token: str)¶

Deletes a user specified by their email.

Endpoint

/api/users/delete

Request Type

POST

Access

MANAGER
Parameters

  • email (str, required) – The email of the user.

  • auth_token (str, required) – Token to verify user credentials.

Returns

  • SuccessfulDelete (Response)

  • code – 200

  • message – Success

  • FailedDelete (Response)

  • code – 404

  • message – Unauthorized.
